extendedInfo.description: Do you use Team Cowboy to participate in your sports team? Are you on the go and donât have time to login to the website to see latest event schedule or set event RSVP?If yes, Manager for Team Cowboy - FREE is for you! Features include:â¢ See combined team upcoming events â¢ See Event Detailsâ¢ Set RSVP for upcoming events Get FULL version to get these additional features:â¢ See Event Rosterâ¢ See Team Informationâ¢ See Team Rosterâ¢ See Individual Player Detailsâ¢ See Past Events Resultsâ¢ Create, Read, Reply or Delete Team Messagesâ¢ Stay up to date with TCManager widgetâ¢ Share upcoming event through SMS, EMail etc NOTE: In order to use the TCManager Android app, you must first register and setup your account online. You'll then be able to login with your registered email address and password. To register, simply follow link below:http://www.teamcowboy.com/Feel free to contact me for any question or report bugs. reviews.title: Basic
reviews.comment: Does what it says. Tried full version and would pay if it does all features of website. Whats the point when the website via browser works well?
reviews.author: Ivan G
